options.content:
## AI Commits Impact Report Dashboard

This dashboard provides insights into AI-assisted development activities by analyzing pull request commits for AI assistance markers (`Assisted-by:` and `Generated-by:`).

**Key Metrics:**
- **Total Commits**, Number of distinct commits in pull requests for the selected project(s)
- **AI Commits**, Number of commits marked with AI assistance indicators
- **AI Adoption Rate**, Percentage of commits that show AI assistance

The dashboard automatically filters out bot commits and test repositories to provide accurate human developer metrics.

> **⚠️ Beta Status:** This dashboard is currently in beta. Metrics and visualizations may be refined based on feedback and usage patterns. Please report any issues or suggestions for improvement.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT prc.commit_sha) as total_commits,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN (CAST(COALESCE(c.message, '') AS CHAR) LIKE '%Assisted-by:%' OR CAST(COALESCE(c.message, '') AS CHAR) LIKE '%assisted-by:%' OR CAST(COALESCE(c.message, '') AS CHAR) LIKE '%Generated-by:%' OR CAST(COALESCE(c.message, '') AS CHAR) LIKE '%generated-by:%')
        OR (CAST(pr.description AS CHAR) LIKE '%Assisted-by:%' OR CAST(pr.description AS CHAR) LIKE '%assisted-by:%' OR CAST(pr.description AS CHAR) LIKE '%Generated-by:%' OR CAST(pr.description AS CHAR) LIKE '%generated-by:%')
        THEN prc.commit_sha 
    END) as ai_commits,
    ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN (CAST(COALESCE(c.message, '') AS CHAR) LIKE '%Assisted-by:%' OR CAST(COALESCE(c.message, '') AS CHAR) LIKE '%assisted-by:%' OR CAST(COALESCE(c.message, '') AS CHAR) LIKE '%Generated-by:%' OR CAST(COALESCE(c.message, '') AS CHAR) LIKE '%generated-by:%')
        OR (CAST(pr.description AS CHAR) LIKE '%Assisted-by:%' OR CAST(pr.description AS CHAR) LIKE '%assisted-by:%' OR CAST(pr.description AS CHAR) LIKE '%Generated-by:%' OR CAST(pr.description AS CHAR) LIKE '%generated-by:%')
        THEN prc.commit_sha 
    END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT prc.commit_sha), 0), 2) as ai_adoption_rate_percent
FROM lake.pull_request_commits prc
JOIN lake.pull_requests pr ON pr.id = prc.pull_request_id
JOIN lake.repos r ON pr.base_repo_id = r.id
JOIN lake.project_mapping pm ON r.id = pm.row_id AND pm.`table` = 'repos'
LEFT JOIN lake.commits c ON prc.commit_sha = c.sha
WHERE pm.project_name in (${project})
AND r.name NOT IN ('konflux-ci/test-repo', 'konflux-ci/merge-queue-release-test', 'konflux-ci/multi-arch-konflux-sample', 'konflux-ci/to-be-deleted', 'konflux-ci/multi-version-konflux-stage-sample')
AND prc.commit_authored_date >= $__timeFrom()
AND prc.commit_authored_date <= $__timeTo()
AND pr.created_date >= $__timeFrom()
AND pr.created_date <= $__timeTo()
AND prc.commit_author_name NOT IN ('red-hat-konflux[bot]', 'red-hat-konflux-kflux-prd-rh02[bot]', 'red-hat-konflux', 'red-hat-konflux-kflux-prd-rh02', 'dependabot[bot]', 'dependabot', 'konflux-ci-test-app[bot]', 'renovate[bot]', 'renovate', 'openshift-ci[bot]', 'openshift-ci', 'rh-tap-build-team[bot]', 'codecov[bot]', 'codecov', 'coderabbitai[bot]', 'coderabbitai', 'github-actions[bot]', 'github-actions', 'github-advanced-security[bot]', 'github-advanced-security', 'red-hat-konflux-kflux-prd-rh03[bot]', 'sourcery-ai[bot]', 'sourcery-ai', 'gemini-code-assist[bot]', 'gemini-code-assist', 'build-trigger', 'daily-build-trigger', 'Konflux Release')
AND (prc.commit_author_email NOT LIKE '%[bot]@users.noreply.github.com' OR prc.commit_author_email IS NULL);
